attributes.action: bring min wage equal to whatever age you are
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its time the national min wage was brought into line with all age groups being equal, meaning that from the age of 16 right to retirement age the min wage should be the same for everyone no matter what age, after all there is ment to be an ageist law here in the UK. Employers would rather take on someone younger than 22 rather than over, just so they can pay less.
